exception.twitchmod.command_blacklisted: Command not executed: command is blacklisted (%s).
exception.twitchmod.command_on_cooldown: Command not executed: cooldown is active for this command (%s).
exception.twitchmod.no_discord_token: No Discord Bot Token provided. Use /discord token to set the token.
exception.twitchmod.no_twitch_key: No OAuth key provided. Use /ttv key to set the key.
gui.twitchmod.alert_book_start: Chat has written you a book.
gui.twitchmod.alert_deathtimer: Chat has given you %s seconds to live.
gui.twitchmod.alert_frenzymode: FRENZY MODE! All commands are executed for the next %s seconds.
gui.twitchmod.alert_peacetimer: Commands are turned off for %s seconds.
gui.twitchmod.chat.bits_required: It costs %s bits or more to run a command.
gui.twitchmod.chat.connected_success_dis: Connected to Discord! Use /ttv status to see details.
gui.twitchmod.chat.connected_success_twi: Connected to Twitch! Use /ttv status to see details.
gui.twitchmod.chat.hint_login: Type /ttv getkey or /discord gettoken to log in.
gui.twitchmod.chat.ready_discord: Discord Bot Token set. Use /discord connect to start!
gui.twitchmod.chat.ready_twitch: Twitch OAuth key set. Use /ttv connect to start!
gui.twitchmod.command_seconds: A new command will be chosen every %s seconds.
gui.twitchmod.commands_link: Click here for a list of commands: http://bit.ly/2UfBCiL
gui.twitchmod.mod_link: Click here to download the mod: http://bit.ly/TwitchVsMinecraft
